The percentage of a hero's health which is restored by each increment of a healing item, expressed as a decimal.

initialGuesses() - Method in class GuessNumber
Calculates the initial number of guesses the hero has as follows: -default number is given by DEFAULT_GUESSES -one extra guess if the hero has the battle advantage special ability -one extra guess for each ExtraGuess power-up currently applied to the hero
